BattleCommands

Class StatusItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleCommands.BattleCommand
      • BattleCommands.Item
        • BattleCommands.StatusItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Item>

    public class StatusItem
extends Item
    StatusItem removes a status from the acting hero.
    Author:
    Kevin

      • StatusItem

        public StatusItem(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String statusAffected,

        Parameters:
        name: - name of item
        statusAffected: - which status ailment will be affected
        player: - player whose inventory this item belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • statusExist

        public boolean statusExist(Hero hero)
        Check if the status that this item affects is actually applied on the acting hero.
        Parameters:
        hero: - hero to check if this status is currently applied to them
        Returns:
        true: status is currently applied, false: not applied

      • getStatusAffected

        public java.lang.String getStatusAffected()
        Get status affected.
        Returns:
        A string: the name of that status that this item will affect

      • useBattleCommand

        public void useBattleCommand(Hero hero,
                             Hero target)
        Use this status item. First checks if the status is afflicted on the hero, if so removes the status. If not prints out an error message.
        Specified by:
        useBattleCommand in class Item
        Parameters:
        hero: - current acting hero
        target: - target hero will usually be null as acting on self
